macros.#Entity: $(t:entity counterpart of the bag which players can interact with)$(l:bag#3)Bag Entity$()
macros.#User: $(t:entity currently holding the #Bag, or the #Entity itself)$(l:glossary)User$()
macros.#Equip: $(t:attack the #Entity, with or without sneak, to pick it up in item form)$(l:bag#3)Equip$()
macros.#Unequip: $(t:place the #Bag in entity form on the ground, removing it from inventory)$(l:bag#3)Unequip$()
macros.#Pad: $(t:an active (receiving a redstone signal) Pad inside the #Bag)$(l:pad)Pad$()
